downloads.title: Desktop Download Requests (Email)
downloads.note: Counts are based on successful email replies (status=sent). Currently all requests are for Windows.

monitoring.title: System Monitoring

tooltips.database: Database status - checks connections, slow queries, and tables without RLS
tooltips.auth: Authentication system status - checks login failures and suspicious attempts
tooltips.edgeFunctions: Edge Functions status - checks error rate and invocations
tooltips.email: Email sending status - bounce rate and alerts
tooltips.activeConnections: Number of active connections to the database. High values may indicate an issue
tooltips.slowQueries: Queries taking more than 1 second on average. Consider optimization or adding indexes
tooltips.seqScans: Sequential Scans - full table scans. High values indicate missing indexes
tooltips.indexScans: Index Scans - scans using indexes. Higher values relative to Seq Scans are better
tooltips.deadTuples: Rows deleted/updated but not cleaned up. High values require VACUUM
tooltips.rowCount: Number of rows in the table
tooltips.failedLogins: ⚠️ Supabase limitation: Login failures are not stored in the audit log. Value will always be 0. You can enable Password Verification Hook for logging.
tooltips.signups: Number of new signups in the last 24 hours
tooltips.passwordResets: Number of password reset requests in the last 24 hours
tooltips.invocations: Number of Edge Function invocations in the last 24 hours
tooltips.errors: Number of errors in Edge Functions in the last 24 hours
tooltips.errorRate: Percentage of errors out of all invocations. Above 5% requires investigation
tooltips.securityAdvisory: Security alerts - tables without RLS, unusual permissions, etc.
tooltips.performanceAdvisory: Performance alerts - missing indexes, slow queries, etc.
tooltips.emailSends: Number of emails sent in the last 24 hours
tooltips.emailDeliveries: Number of emails delivered in the last 24 hours
tooltips.emailBounces: Emails that bounced - invalid address or full mailbox
tooltips.emailComplaints: Users who marked the email as spam - important to address!
tooltips.emailDeliveryRate: Percentage of emails delivered out of total sent
tooltips.emailBounceRate: Percentage of bounced emails. Above 5% requires attention
tooltips.cloudflare: Cloudflare Workers status - requests, errors, and performance
tooltips.cfRequests: Number of requests to Cloudflare Workers in the last 24 hours
tooltips.cfErrors: Number of errors in Cloudflare Workers in the last 24 hours
tooltips.cfErrorRate: Percentage of errors out of all requests
tooltips.vercel: Vercel Deployments status - recent deployments and status
tooltips.vercelDeployments: List of recent deployments on Vercel

monitoring.addAwsKeys: Add AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID and AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY to Supabase Secrets

errors.accessDenied: You don't have permission to access this page
